description:
In this course you find out exactly where to how to get started making money online. This is a Beginner level course taught from real life examples and results - not theory. From 2009-December 30, 2012 I had hundreds of information products online producing zero dollars. Now I have over 20 on multiple platforms that sell every single day and I'm sharing what it takes to actually make money online.

Imagine creating a product or service that is one of your best. You know that you are helping your ideal clients and customer solve problems and no one ever buys it! Are you currently producing products that simply aren't selling? Are you just getting started in business and want to know how to make money online? Wondering if it is as easy as the gurus and experts make it seem?

In this course I will provide real examples and provide questions that you can use to identify your ideal clients, what they really want (and how you can provide it) a specific plan of action and even an assignment where you can take practical steps to create results.

It doesn't matter how amazing your product or service is if you don't have anyone to market or sell it to. What matters is growing a community, building a tribe and reaching your ideal client with the right message every time. There is a foundation that is important for every business and as an entrepreneur it is critical to understand this element.

I strongly suggest that you enroll in the course that precede this:

"How to Create and Package an Information Product"

"Where to Market and Sell Information Products"
title: Online Business Startup Strategies & Guide for Beginners
